questions: What command should be used to run a testrun in tracardi-api?
What port should be used when running a testrun in tracardi-api?
What is the purpose of the -v flag when running a testrun in tracardi-api?
answer:
# Testrun in tracardi-api
```
docker run --rm -it -p 8000:8000 -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material
```
